challenging-assumptions.title: Challenging Assumptions
challenging-assumptions.description: There’s a good cliche out there: “you can’t know what you don’t know”. Assumptions work off the worst side of that – you _feel_ that you have a grasp on whatever’s at hand, but left unchallenged, you’re completely blind to any potential problems that your assumptions don’t account for.

localism.title: A Case for Localism in Tech
